CustomField.formula: Case (year( History_Month__c ), 2013, CASE ( CurrencyIsoCode, "USD", 0.95, "EUR", 1.20, "JPY", 0.012, 0), 2014, CASE ( CurrencyIsoCode, "USD", 0.93, "EUR", 1.20, "JPY", 0.00924, 0), 2015, CASE ( CurrencyIsoCode, "USD", 0.974, "EUR", 1.065, "JPY", 0.008, 0), 2016, CASE ( CurrencyIsoCode, "USD", 0.9681, "EUR", 1.08, "JPY", 0.007856, 0), 2017, CASE ( CurrencyIsoCode, "USD", 1.00, "EUR", 1.10, "JPY", 0.0095, 0), 2018, CASE ( CurrencyIsoCode, "USD", 1.00, "EUR", 1.16, "JPY", 0.0088, 0), 0) * Forecast_Budget_Price_Sales__c
CustomField.label: Forecast Budget Price Sales CHF
